definitions.definition: a type of hard hat that protects the head, worn, for example, by a police officer, a soldier or a person riding a bike or motorbike or playing some sports

examples.text: Police in riot helmets lined the streets.
A protective helmet should be worn at all times.
Cycle helmets dramatically reduce the risk and severity of head injuries.

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from Old French, diminutive of helme, of Germanic origin.
